description.value: While raging, the barbarian shines with a righteous light. This effect bestows upon the barbarian a halo of gleaming light that shines as if it were @Compendium[pf1.spells.7x2z0i8rcx7s81fk]{Daylight} and triggers an @Compendium[pf1.spells.xsecnbuvc3rbrefu]{Invisibility Purge} effect in the barbarianâ€™s square and each adjacent square. The@Compendium[pf1.spells.xsecnbuvc3rbrefu]{Invisibility Purge} only affects nongood creatures. A barbarian must be at least 8th level to select this rage power.
